column2: The time has come for one of the main events of the Festival of the Sun - the ceremony known as Walking Under the Sun. A sunny day is chosen, and on it Zun's faithful walk barefoot around the circumference of the temple ninety-nine times, all the while chanting pious rhymes. It is a ritual of physical and spiritual cleansing, as well as a tribute to the Radiant Lord Zun.\n\nIt is known both for inspiring great piety and for causing great physical and mental exertion.
